posts.post_content: Anyone have a T210-8 Champ Osteen available?

I have seen 2 different Champ cards in 20 years.  There are more, but reside in advanced collections. Probably aware of 4 total since I have been tracking Series 8's for last few decades.  You will run across one in time.
Best of Luck - J
That is a little frightening.  I don't know what I am doing in T210 but maybe I will get lucky for less than an arm and a leg!

The beauty of Series 8 is they are very scarce, but don't cost an arm and a leg. Be prepared for that toughie to go higher or you might be waiting awhile. 90% of them, I acquired at reasonable prices... $200 or less. 10% of them I had to go high. Glad I did as there are a handful that don't come up too often. $300-$400 for those 10%... Higher grades might command more. The Champ has pent up demand, so lay low til that day.
